title: Chinese Government provides $500,000 USD cash grant, food, and blankets after CNMC industrial accident
description: In 2005, the Chinese Government donated $500,000 USD and material assistance (including food and blankets) to the Government of Zambia after a fatal accident took place at a CNMC-owned BGRIMM explosives plant in the town of Kitwe. The explosion killed 51 and injured 2 others.
combined_text:
# Sector
EMERGENCY RESPONSE

# Title
Chinese Government provides $500,000 USD cash grant, food, and blankets after CNMC industrial accident

# Description
In 2005, the Chinese Government donated $500,000 USD and material assistance (including food and blankets) to the Government of Zambia after a fatal accident took place at a CNMC-owned BGRIMM explosives plant in the town of Kitwe. The explosion killed 51 and injured 2 others.
